title: How is leaver-busters going to affect my honor earnings?
body:
I am submitting this to the Help and Support board because I don't know where else it should go ,but I abandoned several ranked games over technical issues which I believe I fixed (WOO!!!!). The main question that I have is whether it will hurt my honor earnings in the future considering I spent 3 days working through the leaver-busters. I response would be much appreciated otherwise have a wonderful day :D .
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: Good news friendo! It looks like you're actually progressing through Honor at a fast rate than normal right now! Doesn't seem like those leaves have impacted you at all ^_^!
